frs.broker

Interface Invoker


  • public interface Invoker
    The InvokerImpl role in the Broker Pattern. It is responsible for demarshalling the request from the client, invoke the proper method on the proper Servant(s), and return a reply object that encapsulates the result of the method call.

    The server request handler will call the invoker's handleRequest method after having received a request on the network.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReplyObject handleRequest(java.lang.String objectId, java.lang.String operationName, java.lang.String payload)
      Handle the incoming request.

    • Method Detail

      • handleRequest

        ReplyObject handleRequest(java.lang.String objectId,
                          java.lang.String operationName,
                          java.lang.String payload)
        Handle the incoming request.
        Parameters:
        objectId - the id of the object (in a broad sense) this request is about
        operationName - the name of the operation (method) to call
        payload - the raw payload in the request message, to be demarshalled into proper parameters
        Returns:
        a reply object representing the outcome of the invocation
